Name: Name Change, East 23rd Street/Delamere Place, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to a street name, East 23rd Street/Delamere Place, Borough of Brooklyn.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.


	New name			Present name			Limits
	
      
      East 23rd Street/		East 23rd Street	            between Campus Road
      Delamere Place 						and Foster Avenue
      

      �2. The new name shall be indicated on the city map and signs bearing the new name 
shall be erected in place of signs bearing the present name.

		�3.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
